title: L'age des Vikings
description: Episode 10 of Series “Il Etait Une Fois L'homme” (= “Once Upon a Time Man”). The Carolingian Empire has crumbled. In Southern Europe, the Sarazins have invaded Sicily, Rome and Provence. In the East, the Magyars make progress toward Lombardia, Venetia and Burgundy. The North is about to experience the full might of the Normans. This episode covers the organization of Viking society as well as their advances in  boat building techniques and marine navigation instrumentation.  Credits: Director, writer, Albert Barille ; photography, Jean-Louis Karcher ; art direction, Philippe Landrot, Rene Borg ; graphic research, Jean Barbaud. Cast: Roger Carel, Francine Laine, Pierre Trabaud, Henri Djanik [original French narration].
related_objects: Series; S002033; Il Etait Une Fois L'homme = Once Upon a Time Man; Active; 1978
